ni.protobuf.types.precision_timestamp_conversion
================================================

.. py:module:: ni.protobuf.types.precision_timestamp_conversion

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Methods to convert to and from PrecisionTimestamp protobuf messages.



Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   ni.protobuf.types.precision_timestamp_conversion.bintime_datetime_to_protobuf
   ni.protobuf.types.precision_timestamp_conversion.bintime_datetime_from_protobuf
   ni.protobuf.types.precision_timestamp_conversion.hightime_datetime_to_protobuf
   ni.protobuf.types.precision_timestamp_conversion.hightime_datetime_from_protobuf


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: bintime_datetime_to_protobuf(value, /)

   Convert a NI-BTF DateTime to a protobuf PrecisionTimestamp.


.. py:function:: bintime_datetime_from_protobuf(message, /)

   Convert a protobuf PrecisionTimestamp to a NI-BTF DateTime.


.. py:function:: hightime_datetime_to_protobuf(value, /)

   Convert a hightime.datetime to a protobuf PrecisionTimestamp.


.. py:function:: hightime_datetime_from_protobuf(message, /)

   Convert a protobuf PrecisionTimestamp to a hightime.datetime.
